CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not sanitize the 'url' parameter before using it to load a URL, which could lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) if a malicious URL is passed. An attacker could exploit this by injecting script in the 'url' parameter to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the context of the application.
